structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Discarded Containers Originally Used For Refrigerative Purposes; Removal Of Doors
law.text: Whoever fails to remove the door or doors from a container originally used for refrigerative purposes before discarding it, or setting it aside for failure to use such container, or before keeping it out of doors for sale or any other purpose in a place accessible to unattended children, shall be punished by a fine of not more than one thousand dollars.
